title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 82.2 - Source confidentiality
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 82.2 - Source confidentiality

State Regulations

Nothing in this Part shall require the Employee Health

Service to provide individuals with access to information which would reveal
the identity of a source who furnished it under an express promise that his or
her identity would be held in confidence. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
82.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
